Sentencas: Development of the syngas production from solid oxide H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis is limited by the intensive energy input and low efficiency.
Titulo: A novel clean and effective syngas production system based on partial oxidation of methane assisted solid oxide co-electrolysis process

Sentencas: Here, we present a new concept to efficiently generate syngas in both sides of the solid oxide electrolyzer by synergistically combining co-electrolysis with partial oxidation of methane (POM).
Titulo: A novel clean and effective syngas production system based on partial oxidation of methane assisted solid oxide co-electrolysis process

Sentencas: Thermodynamic calculation and electrochemical measurements for the POM assisted solid oxide co-electrolysis processes on the SFM-SDC/LSGM/SFM-SDC cells exhibited an reduced electric input, increased energy conversion efficiency and decreased cathodic co-electrolysis polarization resistance in comparison with the conventional co-electrolysis.
Titulo: A novel clean and effective syngas production system based on partial oxidation of methane assisted solid oxide co-electrolysis process

Sentencas: This method will be crucial to establish a clean and effective energy conversion system to meet global sustainable energy needs.
Titulo: A novel clean and effective syngas production system based on partial oxidation of methane assisted solid oxide co-electrolysis process
A novel clean and effective syngas production system based on partial oxidation of methane assisted solid oxide co-electrolysis process
